description.author: Max Bolingbroke
description.synopsis: Framework for running and organising tests, with HUnit and QuickCheck support
description.description:
Allows QuickCheck properties and HUnit test cases to be assembled into test groups, run in parallel (but reported
in deterministic order, to aid diff interpretation) and filtered and controlled by command line options.
All of this comes with colored test output, progress reporting and test statistics output.

package-flags.name: splitbase
package-flags.description: Choose the new smaller, split-up base package

package-flags.name: hunit
package-flags.description: Enable HUnit integration: disabling this is not recommended, as it changes the package API

package-flags.name: quickcheck
package-flags.description: Enable QuickCheck integration: disabling this is not recommended, as it changes the package API
